logic.generators.facades

Interface UserFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserFacadeImpl

    public interface UserFacade
    The logic facade for any DAO-user operation, the data Layer and Presentation layer both goes through this layer when sending/recieving information, consider each layer closed This interface uses one DAO for MYSQL, but multiple can be implemented if desired
